XIII.i.6.1.b
.
Amount of MOHP
The monthly rate of the MOHP is specified in
38 U.S.C. 1562
.
Important
:  This rate is the maximum rate payable, regardless of the number of Medals of Honor awarded to the individual.
Reference
:  For information on payment rates for MOHP, see the
rate table
.
